label: specifiedProductionUnit
comment: A facility production unit for this specified production device.
A facility production unit specified for this production machine.

rangeIncludes.comment: A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.

domainIncludes.comment: An apparatus specified to be used to perform an activity to produce something.
An object, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment, made or adapted in order to perform a production activity.
